sen.j: その後、嵐のはまり役として寛プロ・東亜キネマ・新興・日活・東宝・東映とまたに駆けて40本以上もの鞍馬天狗映画に出演した。
sen.e: Since then it became the best fit role for ARASHI, who performed Kurama Tengu in more than forty movies produced by several film studios: Kan Production, Toa Kinema, Shinko, Nikkatsu, Toho, and Toei.

Since then it became the most suitable role for ARASHI, who performed Kurama Tengu in more than forty movies produced by several film studios: Kan Production, Toa Kinema, Shinko, Nikkatsu, Toho, and Toei.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Since then, Arashi was considered most suitable for the role and performed Kurama Tengu in more than forty movies produced by several film studios: Kan Pro (production), Toa Kinema, Shinko (Shinko Kinema Production), Nikkatsu (Nikkatsu Corporation), Toho (Toho Co., Ltd.), and Toei (Toei Company, Ltd.).
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 嵐扮する鞍馬天狗が敵を次々と切り倒すその壮快なチャンバラ劇は長きに渡り大衆を魅了し続けた。
sen.e: Those films with exciting sword fights in which Kurama Tengu by ARASHI slashed down his enemies one after another kept charming the populace for a long time.
Those films with the exciting sword fights in which Kurama Tengu played by ARASHI slashed down his enemies one after another continued to charm audiences for a long time.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Those films with the exciting sword fights in which Kurama Tengu played by Arashi slashed down his enemies one after another continued to charm audiences for a long time.
sen.cmt: 用語表記を変えました。

sen.j: しかし、原作者である大佛はこれに不満を抱いていた。
sen.e: However, OSARAGI, the original author, was discontented with it.
However, OSARAGI, the original author, was discontented with it.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: However, Osaragi, the original author, was dissatisfied with this.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 1954年、大佛は著作権無視、原作を書き換えて題名だけ盗んでいる、映画の鞍馬天狗は人を斬りすぎて原作者の意向を無視している等との理由を挙げて非難し、嵐が演ずる鞍馬天狗の中止を要求。
sen.e: In 1954 OSARAGI demanded that ARASHI stop performing Kurama Tengu, blaming the films that his copyright was ignored, his titles were stolen while their original contents were rewritten, and Kuram Tengu in the films slashed too many people with his sword against OSARAGI's intention.
sen.cmt: 「理由を挙げて」は英語の中では文中に既に含まれているとして訳出しませんでした。「非難して」の目的語としてthe filmsを加えました。
sen.e: In 1954 OSARAGI demanded that ARASHI stop performing Kurama Tengu, claiming that his copyright was ignored, his titles were stolen while their original contents were rewritten, and Kuram Tengu in the films slashed too many people with his sword which was against OSARAGI's intention.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: In 1954 Osaragi demanded that Arashi stop performing Kurama Tengu, claiming that his copyright was ignored, his titles were stolen and the original content was rewritten, and Kurama Tengu in the films slashed too many people with his sword, which was against Osaragi's intention.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: そして大佛は自ら「天狗ぷろだくしょん」を設立してプロデューサーに就任し、同年より小堀明男の主演による『新鞍馬天狗』シリーズの製作を開始。
sen.e: So, OSARAGI himself established 'Tengu Production,' took up the position of producer, and began producing "The New KuramaTengu" series starring Akio KOBORI in the same year.
So, OSARAGI himself established 'Tengu Productions,' took up the position of producer, and began producing "The New KuramaTengu" series starring Akio KOBORI in the same year.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: So, Osaragi himself established 'Tengu Productions,' took up the position of producer, and began producing "Shin Kurama Tengu" series starring Akio KOBORI in the same year.
sen.cmt: 用語表現を変えました。

sen.j: この作品にはアラカンの鞍馬天狗なら5本は撮れると言われた程の資金が毎回投入されたと言われる。
sen.e: It is said that for each movie a large amount of money which would be equal to take five Kurama Tengu movies by Arakan was funded.
It is said that for each movie a large amount of money equal to the costs of filming five Kurama Tengu movies by Arakan, was funded.
sen.cmt: revised for clarity
sen.e: It is said that a huge sum of money equal to the costs of filming five Kurama Tengu movies by Arakan, was used for each movie.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: この『新鞍馬天狗』は、原作者自ら手掛ける映画作品として当初話題にはなった。
sen.e: "The New Kurama Tengu" was much talked about at first as the film taken by the author himself.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: "The New Kurama Tengu" was much talked about at first since the film was produced by the author himself.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Shin Kurama Tengu attracted much attention at first since the film was produced by the author himself.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: しかし、いざ完成した作品は、小堀の天狗姿が常に嵐と比較されて酷評ばかりされた。
sen.e: But once the film was on screen, KOBORI was always compared with that of ARASHI as the figure of Tengu and was severely criticized.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: But once the film was on screen, KOBORI was always compared with that of ARASHI as the character of Tengu, and was severely criticized.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: But once the film was on screen, Kobori as the character of Tengu was always compared with Arashi and severely criticized.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 近藤勇役に当時既に五十代で老け役も演じていた志村喬を起用するなど配役に無理があった。
sen.e: There was an obvious miscast that Kyo SHIMURA who was already in his fifties and had been performing an old man was appointed for the role of Isami KONDO.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: There was an obvious miscast when Kyo SHIMURA, already in his fifties and had been performing old man roles, was appointed for the role of Isami KONDO.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: It was an obvious mistake in casting when Kyo SHIMURA, already in his fifties and had been performing grandfatherly roles was selected for the role of Isami KONDO.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: その上、ストーリーもクライマックスで、天狗が敵に拳銃を構えるだけ構えて大儀を唱えて挙句に戦うことなく退散してしまうなど、大衆が好む時代劇の骨法や様式を完全に無視したものであった。
sen.e: Furthermore, at the climax of the story, Tengu only pointed his gun at his enemy, preached his good cause, and retreated without fighting; the frame and the style of a historical drama that the populace loved were completely ignored.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Furthermore, at the climax of the story, Tengu only pointed his gun at his enemy, preached his good cause, and retreated without fighting; the frame and style of the historical drama that the populace loved, were completely ignored.
sen.cmt: grammar, punctuation
sen.e: Furthermore, at the climax of the story, Tengu only pointed his gun at his enemy, preached about the good cause and retreated without fighting which completely ignored the framework and style of historical drama that the spectators loved.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: その爽快感も全く欠落した内容は、ある意味で大佛の自己満足にしか過ぎない代物であった。
sen.e: Without stirring any sense of excitement, the contents were, in a sense, nothing but OSARAGI's complacency.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Without stirring any sense of excitement, the contents were, in a sense, nothing but OSARAGI's complacency.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Without stirring any sense of excitement, the contents were, in a sense, nothing but for Osaragi's self-satisfaction.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: この様な作品が成功する道理は当然無く、興行面で不振を極めた。
sen.e: Of course there was no reason for such a product to be successful, and it was a terrible box-office failure.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Of course there was no reason for such a product to be successful, and it was a terrible box-office failure.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Of course there was no reason for such a product to be successful, and it was a terrible box-office failure.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 「日本映画史に残る大失敗作」「大佛が作家としての自身のキャリアに自ら疵を付けた」と酷評された程の悲惨な結果に終わった。
sen.e: Severely criticized as 'the flop that would remain in the Japanese movie history,' or 'OSARAGI stained his own career as a writer,' it came to a miserable end.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Severely criticized as 'the flop that would go down in Japanese movie history,' or 'OSARAGI stained his own career as a writer,' it came to a miserable end.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: It came to a miserable end when it was severely criticized as 'the flop that would go down in Japanese movie history,' or 'Osaragi stained his own career as a writer.'
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 天狗役を演じた小堀にとってもまた、巻き添えを食らう形で俳優キャリアの疵となってしまった。
sen.e: KOBORI who performed Tengu was also embroiled to get stained on his career as an actor.
sen.cmt: 「巻き添えを食らう形で」は「巻き添えを食らい」と訳しました。
sen.e: KOBORI who performed Tengu was also embroiled and it stained his acting career.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: It also hampered the acting career of Kobori, who performed Tengu.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 大佛プロデュース・小堀主演の『新鞍馬天狗』の興行成績は惨憺たるもので、作を重ねる毎に映画館サイドからの大佛に対する不満・怨嗟・抗議の声だけが増えてゆく始末であった。
sen.e: "The New Kurama Tengu" produced by OSARAGI, starring KOBORI was a box-office bomb, and each film made movie theater owners shout their dissatisfaction, grudge, and protest more and more loudly against OSARAGI.

"The New Kurama Tengu" produced by OSARAGI, starring KOBORI was a box-office bomb, and each film made movie theater owners shout their dissatisfaction, grudge, and protest more and more loudly against OSARAGI.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Shin Kurama Tengu' produced by Osaragi, starring Kobori was a box-office bomb, and each film made movie theater owners increasingly vocal about their dissatisfaction, grudges, and protests against Osaragi.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 結局、大駄作という酷評を覆す事はできず、全10作を予定するも、第3作『新鞍馬天狗 夕立の武士』を最後に打ち切りとなる。
sen.e: After all, OSARAGI could not overturn the harsh criticism as a perfect trash, nor shoot ten films as scheduled but dropped; the third film "The New Kurama Tengu, The Samurai in the Shower" was the last.

After all, OSARAGI could not overturn the harsh criticism of his films being trash, nor shoot ten films as scheduled but he dropped; the third film "The New Kurama Tengu, The Samurai in the Shower," was the last.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: In the end, Osaragi could not disprove the harsh criticism of his films being trash and did not shoot the ten films as scheduled but finished with the third film "Shin Kurama Tengu, Yudachi no Bushi" (The New Kurama Tengu, The Samurai in the Shower).
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: この『新鞍馬天狗』で3度も煮え湯を飲まされる格好になった映画館サイドは、その損失補填を理由に大佛にアラカンの鞍馬天狗の復活を強硬に要求した。
sen.e: The movie theater owners who had lost a huge amount of money three times demanded strongly the revival of Arakan as the Kurama Tengu from OSARAGI to compensate their damages.
The movie theater owners who had lost huge amounts of money three times demanded strongly the revival of Arakan as the Kurama Tengu from OSARAGI to compensate for their damages.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: The movie theater owners who had lost huge sums of money three times over "Shin Kurama Tengu" strongly demanded from Osaragi the revival of Arakan as Kurama Tengu to compensate for their damages.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: さすがの大佛もこれは呑まざるを得ず、ここにアラカンの鞍馬天狗が復活した。
sen.e: Even the great author OSARAGI had to accept their proposal, and thus the Kurama Tengu by Arakan came back.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処「さすがの」をthe great authorとしました。
sen.e: Even the great author OSARAGI had to accept their proposal, and thus the Kurama Tengu played by Arakan returned.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Even the great author Osaragi had to accept their proposal, and thus the Kurama Tengu played by Arakan returned.
sen.cmt: 用語表記を変えました。

sen.j: だが、そこまでの経緯が経緯ゆえにもはや嵐自身も乗り気ではなく、僅か2作品で打ち止めとなった。
sen.e: But because of these circumstances, ARASHI was not much enthusiastic; only two films were made, and that was the end of it.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: But because of these circumstances, ARASHI was not very enthusiastic; only two films were made, and that was the end of it.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: But because of these circumstances, Arashi was not very enthusiastic; only two films were made, and that was the end of it.
sen.cmt: 用語表記を変えました。

sen.j: その後、映画では東千代之介と市川雷蔵が天狗を演じたものの、いずれも長続きせずに終わっている。
sen.e: After that, Chiyonosuke AZUMA and Raizo ICHIKAWA performed the Tengu in the movies, but neither of them were produced many times.
After that, Chiyonosuke AZUMA and Raizo ICHIKAWA performed Tengu in the movies, but neither of them were produced many times.
sen.cmt: 定冠詞 the 不要
sen.e: After that, Chiyonosuke AZUMA and Raizo ICHIKAWA performed Tengu in the movies, but neither of them made many films.
